name: Top Ships Inc.
description: Top Ships Inc. is a shipping company that specializes in the transportation of petroleum and petroleum products. Founded in 2000 and headquartered in Maroussi, Greece, Top Ships operates a modern fleet of tankers designed to meet stringent international safety and environmental standards. The company focuses on eco-friendly shipping solutions, featuring vessels equipped with advanced technologies to reduce emissions and improve fuel efficiency. Top Ships aims to capitalize on the growing demand for efficient transportation of energy resources, particularly in the Mediterranean and other strategic shipping routes. With a commitment to sustainability, Top Ships has implemented measures to ensure compliance with the latest environmental regulations while optimizing operational efficiency. The company is actively involved in the global shipping market and seeks to expand its fleet in response to evolving market demands. Through strategic partnerships and investments in innovative shipping technologies, Top Ships is positioned to enhance its competitive edge and deliver reliable shipping services to its clients.

seo.meta_title: Top Ships Inc. | Leading Petroleum Transportation Services
seo.meta_description: Top Ships Inc. specializes in the transportation of petroleum and petroleum products, focusing on eco-friendly shipping solutions and operational efficiency.

faq.answer: Top Ships specializes in the transportation of petroleum and petroleum products.

faq.answer: Top Ships is headquartered in Maroussi, Greece.

faq.question: What types of vessels does Top Ships operate?
faq.answer: Top Ships operates petroleum and product tankers.
